mapper.select: SELECT BACKLOG_CONTENT FROM BACKLOG WHERE BACKLOG_CONTENT = #{backlogContent} ORDER BY BACKLOG_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BACKLOG ( BACKLOG_NO ,BACKLOG_NAME ,BACKLOG_CONTENT ,BACKLOG_STATUS ,BACKLOG_PRIORITY ,PROJECT_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_BACKLOG_NO.NEXTVAL, #{backlogName}, #{backlogContent}, #{backlogStatus}, #{backlogPriority}, #{projectNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT pe.PROJECT_NO, e.EMPLOYEE_NAME, r.ROLE_NO, t.TYPE_NAME, a.AUTHORITY_STATE,e.EMPLOYEE_NO,a.TYPE_NO FROM PROJECT_EMPLOYEE pe JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON (pe.EMPLOYEE_NO = e.EMPLOYEE_NO) JOIN ROLE_AUTHORITY_TYPE r ON (pe.ROLE_NO = r.ROLE_NO) JOIN AUTHORITY a ON (r.AUTHORITY_NO = a.AUTHORITY_NO) JOIN AUTHORITY_TYPE t ON (a.TYPE_NO=t.TYPE_NO) WHERE pe.PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo} AND e.EMPLOYEE_NO=#{employeeNo}
